text: Kefer Şuş (, ) or Kafr Shoush () is a village in northern Aleppo Governorate, northwestern Syria. It is located between Azaz and Çobanbey (al-Rai) on the Queiq Plain, some north of the city of Aleppo, and south of the border with the Turkish province of Kilis. The village administratively belongs to Nahiya Sawran in Azaz District. Nearby localities include Kafr Ghan to the east and Kafr Burayshah to the west. In the 2004 census, Kafr Shoush had a population of 95. ==References== Category:Turkmen communities in Syria
title: Kafr Shoush
